title: Error message arguments in pkg/net/rpc/jsonrpc/all_test.go are reversed
body:
in TestClient the order or the arguments to the error messages is reversed.

For example, around line 133:

133     if reply.C != args.A+args.B {
134         t.Errorf("Add: expected %d got %d", reply.C, args.A+args.B)
135     }

presumably args.A+args.B is actually the expected result and reply.C is what was returned
